Kurasu's GREAT Combo (thanks to DP)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2001 Topics (Year Of The Heart Crystal): Kurasu's GREAT Combo (thanks to DP)
By Kurasu Soratobu on Saturday, December 8, 2001 - 12:02 am:

I've had good combos, but never a great before. And thanks to the information provided by Dark Phoenix, I decided to engineer myself a great. The parents are a Gariel peach-getter and money-maker, whose long years are close to ending, and a Lepus that was raised for the sole purpose of being that poor dragon's bride. Here are our contestants:

Nuri-Bun (Lepus [Pixie/Hare])
LifPowIntSkiSpdDef
644734763403186143


Golden (Gariel [Dragon/Gali])
LifPowIntSkiSpdDef
416993999778761185


After correcting, both monsters had the order: Int, Pow, Skl, Lif, Spd, Def

Combination: GREAT!

And the child:

Daina [Pixie/Dragon]
LifPowIntSkiSpdDef
126180413186161101


Not as terrifying as some we've seen, but she's my first Great and I'm proud of her. :)

By torey_luvullo on Saturday, December 8, 2001 - 08:19 am:

that is a very nice daina! what were the starting techs?

By Kurasu Soratobu on Saturday, December 8, 2001 - 04:30 pm:

The two basic techs, along with high kick, heel raid, slap, ray, and flame. :) Neither parent had _tons_ of moves (the dragon had more than the Daina, but only by one), but it's enough to keep me going. And I had so much fun raising that Lepus power-based that I'm thinking of trying it again, so I'm not too disappointed about the line of physical attacks. Imagine that: a defense-power pixie. ;)

By Nate Railsback on Saturday, December 8, 2001 - 10:01 pm:

Hmmmm...isn't Life higher than Skill on the Lepus?

By alphasquee on Sunday, December 9, 2001 - 12:20 am:

Kurasu! jeesh i havent seen u at chat for awhile, u still going their? just wanted to say hi!

By Deior on Sunday, December 9, 2001 - 07:49 am:

Life is higher, but the lepus life stat is multiplied by .5(2 in life) while the skill stat is multiplied by 1.5(4 in ski). With the corrected stat order, skill would still be higher than life.

By Nate Railsback on Sunday, December 9, 2001 - 11:21 pm:

Must be a weird technicality that I didn't read.

By Kurasu Soratobu on Tuesday, December 11, 2001 - 12:35 am:

Yeah, I still do chat now and then. Unfortunately, when I do, there's almost never people around. I popped in once just before you popped out. I need to get on earlier in the day. Darn my SO and our time-sharing. ;)

And it is kind of wierd, Nate, but it makes sense once you read the comparisons... at least to me, it did. Check out DP's posting on combinations in the 'Combining' section. It's why I'm working on the baseline collecting.
